title: TRON Rises as Stablecoin Hub in Volatile Crypto Market
description: The market cap for TRON (TRX) has grown to $27.59 billion, and it has remained the ninth-largest coin. Investors’ solid confidence is shown in the 3.10% daily rise, lifting Cardano to $0.2909, even though Bitcoin and Ethereum are experiencing a rough time in the markets. Network Activity Fuels Optimism In the last week, TRON’s blockchain […]The post TRON Rises as Stablecoin Hub in Volatile Crypto Market appeared first on ABC Money.

title: Crypto’s hottest new trend: publicly traded companies buying bunches of bitcoin
description: It’s one of crypto’s hottest trends: publicly traded companies buying bitcoin and then buying even more. President Donald Trump’s media company just announced a plan to raise $2.5 billion to buy bitcoin, joining a growing number of so-called “bitcoin treasury companies” as the world’s most popular cryptocurrency hits all-time highs. The companies buy bitcoin for […]

title: 'Bitcoin Family' hides crypto codes etched onto metal cards on four continents after recent kidnappings

title: Bitcoin and crypto funds on their way for UK investors, as watchdog plans to lift its ban
description: The FCA banned the sale of bitcoin and other crypto ETNs to UK retail investors alongside crypto derivatives in 2020, arguing they were not appropriate.

title: Is It Ethereum’s Time Again? ETH and ETH/BTC Technical Outlook
description: Ethereum had a rough beginning of 2025—failing to reach new all-time highs, while Bitcoin smashed through its own ATH multiple times. Solana, providing a cheaper alternative to ETH services, also held stronger than the Ether throughout the latter part of 2024 and beginning 2025. title: Bitcoin and crypto funds could soon be coming to the UK, as FCA plans to lift its ban

title: IMF puts Pakistan on the spot over crypto mining and AI energy use
description: Islamabad: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has expressed serious concerns over Pakistan’s decision to allocate electricity to Bitcoin mining operations and Artificial Intelligence (AI) data centers without prior consultation. The move has triggered questions about transparency and compliance with the conditions of the ongoing IMF loan program. Sources say the IMF was not informed in […]
